thread.title: Eden Hazard WILL sign £300,000-a-week deal to stay at Chelsea amid Real Madrid interest, with John Terry also signing on for another season at Stamford Bridge
thread.title_full: Eden Hazard WILL sign £300,000-a-week deal to stay at Chelsea amid Real Madrid interest, with John Terry also signing on for another season at Stamford Bridge

author: dfraser
title: Eden Hazard WILL sign £300,000-a-week deal to stay at Chelsea amid Real Madrid interest, with John Terry also signing on for another season at Stamford Bridge
text:
EFL BUILDING BRIDGES Eden Hazard WILL sign £300,000-a-week deal to stay at Chelsea amid Real Madrid interest, with John Terry also signing on for another season at Stamford Bridge 
Blues boss Antonio Conte convinces Belgian forward to a pen a new contract as they stave off interest from Spanish giants By Dave Fraser 31st March 2017, 11:27 am Updated: 31st March 2017, 1:02 pm
